dcl_constantbuffer cb0[13], immediateIndexed
dcl_sampler s0, mode_default
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_input_ps linear centroid v0.xyzw
dcl_input_ps linear centroid v1.xyz
dcl_output o0.xyzw
dcl_temps 7

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Camera Position adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed 9507b5571991b372-ps.txt

mul r3.w, r3.x, r3.y
mul r5.x, r3.w, cb0[9].x
mul r5.y, r3.w, cb0[10].x
mul r5.z, r3.w, cb0[11].x
mul r5.w, r3.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r6.x, r5.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r6.y, r5.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r6.z, r5.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r4.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r6.xyz

mov r0.y, l(1.000000)
mov r0.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
mov r1.x, l(0)
loop 
  ige r1.y, r1.x, l(32)
  breakc_nz r1.y
  mad r1.yz, icb[r1.x + 0].xxyx, v0.zzwz, v0.xxyx
  ge r2.xy, r1.yzyy, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000, 0.000000)
  ge r2.zw, l(0.000000, 0.000000, 1.000000, 1.000000), r1.yyyz
  and r1.w, r2.z, r2.x
  and r1.w, r2.y, r1.w
  and r1.w, r2.w, r1.w
  sample_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r0.x, r1.yzyy, t0.xyzw, s0
  dp2 r1.y, r0.xyxx, cb0[11].zwzz
  dp2 r0.x, r0.xyxx, cb0[12].zwzz
  div r0.x, -r1.y, r0.x
  ge r0.x, r0.x, v1.z
  and r0.x, r0.x, l(0x3f800000)
  add r2.x, r0.x, r0.z
  add r2.y, r0.w, l(1.000000)
  movc r0.zw, r1.wwww, r2.xxxy, r0.zzzw
  iadd r1.x, r1.x, l(1)
endloop 
div r0.x, r0.z, r0.w
mul o0.xyz, r0.xxxx, v1.xxxx
mov o0.w, v1.y
ret 
// Approximately 27 instruction slots used
